title: Product Designer (UI/UX + Service Planning)
job_overview:
About Us
We are a fast-growing Korean online education company providing premium video call English lessons.
To enhance our service experience, we are looking for a talented and detail-oriented Product Designer who can cover both UI/UX design and service planning.

Responsibilities
• Plan and design the overall UX structure and user flow of our online English learning platform.
• Create wireframes, prototypes, and final UI designs using Figma.
• Collaborate closely with the founder to understand service goals and user needs.
• Work with developers to ensure designs are implemented accurately.
• Continuously improve user experience based on feedback and usage data.

Requirements
• At least 2 years of experience in UI/UX or Product Design.
• Strong skills in Figma and prototyping.
• Experience designing service-oriented platforms (preferably EdTech or online services).
• Good communication skills in English (for collaboration with founder and developer).
• Ability to take ownership and think critically about UX problems.

Nice to Have
• Experience working with Korean or East Asian clients.
• Familiarity with Notion, Figjam, and other collaboration tools.
• Basic understanding of frontend process (HTML, CSS, or development handoff).

Work Details
• Stable and long-term remote position
• Philippines only
• Monthly salary: PHP 23,000
• Work schedule: 12:30 PM to 4:30 PM (PHT)


How to Apply
Please send your CV, portfolio (Figma link preferred), and a brief introduction.
Selected candidates will be asked to complete a small test project.
Please include examples of UX flow, UI design, and any planning documents if available.

If you’re interested, please provide your WhatsApp number along with your application so we can contact you for the next steps
